Nov. 20, 2016 D GBBA Own Choice (Section A)
GBBA Own Choice (Section A) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest GBBA Own Choice Contest gbba-own-choice-section-a
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
All Saints Academy, Cheltenham James Whitson Trophy for Winning Conductor - Chris Howley (Forest of Dean Brass) Best Instrumentalist - Craig Wintle (solo cornet, Forest of Dean Brass)
Special Awards (All Sections): Arthur Gardner Memorial Trophy for Best Cornet Player of the Day - Craig Wintle (Forest of Dean Brass) Tedder Watkins Trophy for Best Flugel Player of the Day - Chalford Steve Purvis Memorial Trophy for Best Euphonium Player of the Day - Wantage B Haydn Evans Memorial Trophy for Best Percussion Section of the Day - A W Parker (Drybrook) The Cooling Shield for Best Instrumentalist of the Day - Craig Wintle (solo cornet, Forest of Dean Brass)
Nov. 25, 2016, 1:37 a.m. Nov. 25, 2016, 1:50 a.m.
1 Forest of Dean Brass Chris Howley Prisms
2 Wantage Concert Brass Danny Dullforce Voyage of Discovery
3 A. W. Parker (Drybrook) Band Joshua Ruck Vivat!
